basics.name: Carlos Henriquez
basics.label: Front End Developer
basics.summary: Front End Developer seeking to work closely with a highly motivated team to apply experience in Web Development by leveraging new and existing technologies, and implementing effective solutions.

work.summary: Responsible for turning whiteboard sketches into working prototypes, and transforming design mockups into user interfaces
highlights: Maintain both new and legacy environments, supporting React JS and Vanilla Javascript code base.
Update site content inside IBM WebSphere Ecommerce Content Management System.
Integrate created code with other technologies, including web services, java back-end systems, content management systems, etc.
Collaborate with backend developers and creative designers to create new site features as neededÂ and to troubleshoot and solve problems.

work.summary: Work with the Deloitte IT Innovation team to create apps that eliminate manual processes within IT
highlights: Developed tools using JavaScript, HTML5/CSS3/SASS, and SQL.
Developed an Asset Management tool that automates the laptop shipping process.
Took over development of Web App used by all internal IT in the US and India, that brings together all important end-user information by the swipe of a badge into one UI.

work.summary: Video Engineer Contractor with the General Services Administration
highlights: Developed SQL reports, pulling metrics for leadership.
Maintenance of data, video streaming, content delivery, and network hardware systems.
Configured and installed various VTC units, streaming servers, VTC appliances, and media players.

work.summary: Developed internal sites used by School Staff to access student data using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, SQL DB and Quickbase
highlights: Created a Responsive Frontend dashboard that displayed student data entry errors, converting raw data into actionable data used by school staff.
Developed a Frontend account management system for User Account creations and modifications in the student data system.
